content.original: Bargaining Chip
content.prevOriginal: Bargaining Chip
content.content: Разменная монета

content.original: Commander, we're getting intel about the base's location.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, we're getting intel about the base's location.
content.content: Командир, мы получили информацию о местонахождении базы.

content.original: Move up to a position where you can get eyes on the base, and let's see what's in there.
content.prevOriginal: Move up to a position where you can get eyes on the base, and let's see what's in there.
content.content: Выдвигайтесь на позицию, с которой сможете разведать территорию базы. Поглядим, что там.

content.original: Eliminate any {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} defenders and secure the base, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate any {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} defenders and secure the base, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: Подавите любое сопротивление {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} на территории базы, командир. Оливейра конец связи.

content.original: The base is ours, Commander. Well done.
content.prevOriginal: The base is ours, Commander. Well done.
content.content: База в наших руках, командир. Отличная работа.

content.original: Shit. I'm calling this one, Commander. We just don't have the firepower.
content.prevOriginal: Shit. I'm calling this one, Commander. We just don't have the firepower.
content.content: Дело дрянь, командир. Сматываем удочки. В следующий раз лучше принести стволы побольше.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые сигналы на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Командир, в вашем районе замечены вражеские силы. Придётся сначала разобраться с ними.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На радаре чисто, переходите к следующей задаче.

content.original: Dropship arriving! Prepare to head out.
content.prevOriginal: Dropship arriving! Prepare to head out.
content.content: Приближается десантный корабль! Встречайте гостей.

content.original: We're seeing point defenses powering up, Commander. We're going to have to take those out before we can secure this base.
content.prevOriginal: We're seeing point defenses powering up, Commander. We're going to have to take those out before we can secure this base.
content.content: Командир, замечена активация защитных турелей. Придется занятсья ими прежде, чем захватывать эту базу.

content.original: There's the base. Let's avoid any surprises, shall we?
content.prevOriginal: There's the base. Let's avoid any surprises, shall we?
content.content: Вижу базу. Надеюсь в этот раз обойдётся без лишних меходвижений.

content.original: Watch for additional {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} forces on the ground, and expect contact.
content.prevOriginal: Watch for additional {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} forces on the ground, and expect contact.
content.content: Внимание! Прибыло подкрепление от {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Готовьтесь встречать.

content.original: I'm not sure the outcome will be what they want, but I don't specialize in interstellar politics. It sounds like a declaration of war to me so be prepared for more than a little resistance.
content.prevOriginal: I'm not sure the outcome will be what they want, but I don't specialize in interstellar politics. It sounds like a declaration of war to me so be prepared for more than a little resistance.
content.content: Не уверен, что всё пройдёт именно так, как они ожидают. Я, конечно, не специалист в межзвездной политике, но всё это звучит как объявление войны, так что будьте готовы к «немного» большему сопротивлению.

content.original: Scout the Base
content.prevOriginal: Scout the Base
content.content: Проведите разведку территории базы

content.original: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Defenders
content.prevOriginal: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Defenders
content.content: Уничтожьте оборонительные силы {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: Occupy the Base
content.prevOriginal: Occupy the Base
content.content: Захватите базу

content.original: Hidden
content.prevOriginal: Hidden
content.content: Hidden

content.original: Hold the base until {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} Forces Arrive
content.prevOriginal: Hold the base until {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} Forces Arrive
content.content: Удерживайте базу до прибытия сил {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.prevOriginal: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.content: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

content.original: Pacify the Area Around the Base
content.prevOriginal: Pacify the Area Around the Base
content.content: Зачистите территорию вокруг базы

content.original: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.content: Уничтожьте подкрепления {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: Destroy Defensive Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Defensive Turrets
content.content: Уничтожьте защитные турели

content.original: Trade negotiations between {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} and {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} have broken down. We believe that if we capture and hold a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military base in the {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} system, we will be able to force them back to the negotiating table. Your job is to take the base and hold it until our forces can occupy it.
content.prevOriginal: Trade negotiations between {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} and {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} have broken down. We believe that if we capture and hold a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military base in the {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} system, we will be able to force them back to the negotiating table. Your job is to take the base and hold it until our forces can occupy it.
content.content: Торговые переговоры между {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} и {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} зашли в тупик. Мы считаем, что если {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} потеряют свою военную базу в системе {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, это вынудит их снова сесть за стол переговоров. Ваша задача - захватить эту базу и удерживать до подхода наших войск.

content.original: Stealing is a Form of Flattery
content.prevOriginal: Stealing is a Form of Flattery
content.content: Воровство - это особый способ лести

content.original: We're here to capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station.
content.prevOriginal: We're here to capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station.
content.content: Мы здесь, чтобы захватить исследовательскую станцию ​​{TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}.

content.original: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and get eyes on the facility.
content.prevOriginal: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and get eyes on the facility.
content.content: Нужно выдвинуться к позиции, с которой мы сможем лучше наблюдать за передвижениями противника и следить за объектом.

content.original: Eliminate opposition and take control of the territory, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate opposition and take control of the territory, Commander.
content.content: Устраните сопротивление и возьмите под свой контроль территорию, командир.

content.original: The research station is under our control, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: The research station is under our control, Commander.
content.content: Исследовательская станция находится под нашим контролем, командир.

content.original: We're ready to send in the extraction ships, for you and the scientists.
content.prevOriginal: We're ready to send in the extraction ships, for you and the scientists.
content.content: Мы готовы эвакуировать вас и ученых.

content.original: Sit tight, Commander. I think {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be pleased with the results.
content.prevOriginal: Sit tight, Commander. I think {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be pleased with the results.
content.content: Выдыхаем, командир. Думаю, представитель {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} будет доволен результатами.

content.original: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.
content.content: Нам это всё не по зубам. Пакуем вещи и на выход, командир.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые сигналы на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Командир, в вашем районе замечены вражеские силы. Придётся сначала разобраться с ними.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На радаре чисто, переходите к следующей задаче.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.content: Десантный корабль прибывает на посадку! Быстрее грузимся и сваливаем отсюда!

content.original: Commander, a word of warning: we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, a word of warning: we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.content: Командующий, небольшое предупреждение: у нас есть сообщения, что на этой базе могут быть укреплённые огневые точки.

content.original: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.prevOriginal: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.content: Турели, босс. Не спускайте с них глаз на случай, если они в рабочем состоянии.

content.original: Alright, you should have good view of the research facility now.
content.prevOriginal: Alright, you should have good view of the research facility now.
content.content: Прекрасно, отсюда у вас должен быть неплохой обзор на исследовательский центр.

content.original: Be careful of additional forces. Reports are they have additional units in the area that are rallying back at the base. Expect contact.
content.prevOriginal: Be careful of additional forces. Reports are they have additional units in the area that are rallying back at the base. Expect contact.
content.content: Будьте осторожны. Разведка докладывает, что у них есть дополнительные силы в районе, которые сейчас следуют обратно на базу. Возможен огневой контакт.

content.original: Commander, plausible deniability is our specialty.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, plausible deniability is our specialty.
content.content: Чтож, не задавать лишних вопросов - наша специальность.

content.original: Scout the Research Station
content.prevOriginal: Scout the Research Station
content.content: Проведите разведку территории исследовательской станции

content.original: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Forces
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Forces
content.content: Уничтожьте силы обороны {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: Occupy the Research Station
content.prevOriginal: Occupy the Research Station
content.content: Захватите исследовательский комплекс

content.original: Hidden
content.prevOriginal: Hidden
content.content: Hidden

content.original: Hold the Station while Reinforcements Arrive
content.prevOriginal: Hold the Station while Reinforcements Arrive
content.content: Удерживайте станцию до прибытия подкреплений

content.original: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.prevOriginal: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.content: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

content.original: Pacify the Area Around the Research Station
content.prevOriginal: Pacify the Area Around the Research Station
content.content: Зачистите территорию вокруг исследовательского комплекса

content.original: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.content: Уничтожьте подкрепления {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: Destroy Defensive Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Defensive Turrets
content.content: Уничтожьте защитные турели

content.original: We have long suspected that there is a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station hidden in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, and we've finally gotten wind of its possible location. We need a few brave, and plausibly deniable, mercenaries to secure the location for a dropship extraction of any valuable scientific personnel.
content.prevOriginal: We have long suspected that there is a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station hidden in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, and we've finally gotten wind of its possible location. We need a few brave, and plausibly deniable, mercenaries to secure the location for a dropship extraction of any valuable scientific personnel.
content.content: Мы давно подозревали, что в системе {TGT_SYSTEM.name} находится секретная исследовательская станция {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}, и наконец узнали о ее возможном местонахождении. Нам нужно несколько смелых и молчаливых наемников, чтобы обезопасить это место для прилёта дропшипа и препроводить в него весь ценный научный персонал.

content.original: Manufacturing Facility
content.prevOriginal: Manufacturing Facility
content.content: Производственные мощности

content.original: The manufacturing facility is just ahead, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: The manufacturing facility is just ahead, Commander.
content.content: Промышленный комплекс прямо перед вами, командир.

content.original: Before we start our attack, we should recon the facility's defenses from a defensible position.
content.prevOriginal: Before we start our attack, we should recon the facility's defenses from a defensible position.
content.content: Прежде чем атаковать, было бы неплохо разведать оборону объекта с хорошо укреплённых позиций.

content.original: Once that's done, we'll move in and capture the base. Good luck, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Once that's done, we'll move in and capture the base. Good luck, Commander.
content.content: Сразу после этого можно будет с чистой совестью выходить на штурм. Удачи, командир.

content.original: That's it. We've taken control of the facility, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's it. We've taken control of the facility, Commander.
content.content: Это был последний. Объект под нашим контролем, командир.

content.original: Given what we've seen here, I'm guessing {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be very pleased with our work.
content.prevOriginal: Given what we've seen here, I'm guessing {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be very pleased with our work.
content.content: Учитывая всё то, что здесь произошло, я полагаю представитель от {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} будет очень доволен нашей работой.

content.original: Doesn't seem like we're going to be able to win this one, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Doesn't seem like we're going to be able to win this one, Commander.
content.content: Не похоже, что мы сможем победить в этот раз, командир.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые сигналы на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Командир, в вашем районе замечены вражеские силы. Придётся сначала разобраться с ними.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На радаре чисто, переходите к следующей цели.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing, Commander. Once they secure the facility, we're dusting off.
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing, Commander. Once they secure the facility, we're dusting off.
content.content: Десантный корабль прибывает на посадку, командир. Как только объект будет захвачен, мы вас вытащим.

content.original: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.content: Командующий, небольшое предупреждение: есть сообщения, что на базе могут быть укреплённые огневые точки.

content.original: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.prevOriginal: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.content: Турели, босс. Не спускайте с них глаз на случай, если они в рабочем состоянии.

content.original: That's a Star League era manufacturing facility, all right. No wonder {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} wants it so bad.
content.prevOriginal: That's a Star League era manufacturing facility, all right. No wonder {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} wants it so bad.
content.content: Всё верно, это завод эпохи Звездной Лиги. Неудивительно, что {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} так сильно хочет прибрать его к рукам.

content.original: Be careful of reinforcements. We're getting intel that there are additional enemy forces rallying to the facility.
content.prevOriginal: Be careful of reinforcements. We're getting intel that there are additional enemy forces rallying to the facility.
content.content: Остерегайтесь контратаки. Пришла информация, что к объекту стягиваются дополнительные силы противника.

content.original: They haven't told us what, precisely, the facility is producing, but given the strength of enemy forces on the ground, it's something worth protecting.
content.prevOriginal: They haven't told us what, precisely, the facility is producing, but given the strength of enemy forces on the ground, it's something worth protecting.
content.content: Нам не рассказали, что именно производится здесь, но, учитывая то, какие силы развёрнуты для обороны, это не канцелярские скрепки.

content.original: Scout the Facility
content.prevOriginal: Scout the Facility
content.content: Проведите разведку территории производственного комплекса

content.original: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Garrison
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Garrison
content.content: Уничтожьте гарнизон {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: Occupy the Facility
content.prevOriginal: Occupy the Facility
content.content: Захватите производственный комплекс

content.original: Hidden
content.prevOriginal: Hidden
content.content: Hidden

content.original: Hold the Facility Until Reinforcements Arrive
content.prevOriginal: Hold the Facility Until Reinforcements Arrive
content.content: Удерживайте позицию до прибытия подкреплений

content.original: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.prevOriginal: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.content: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

content.original: Pacify the Area around the Base
content.prevOriginal: Pacify the Area around the Base
content.content: Зачистите территорию вокруг базы

content.original: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.content: Уничтожьте подкрепления {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: Destroy Defensive Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Defensive Turrets
content.content: Уничтожьте защитные турели

content.original: We've discovered that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has reactivated an old manufacturing facility in this system. To maintain the balance of power in this system, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} needs to capture this facility. You'll make a surgical strike, occupy the base, and hold it until {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces can arrive to take control.
content.prevOriginal: We've discovered that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has reactivated an old manufacturing facility in this system. To maintain the balance of power in this system, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} needs to capture this facility. You'll make a surgical strike, occupy the base, and hold it until {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces can arrive to take control.
content.content: Мы обнаружили, что {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} повторно активировали старый производственный объект в этой системе. Чтобы сохранить баланс сил, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} должны захватить этот объект. От вас требуется нанести хирургически точный удар, захватить базу и удерживать ее до прихода сил {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}.

content.original: Ripe for the Picking
content.prevOriginal: Ripe for the Picking
content.content: Время жатвы

content.original: The facility our friends want us to capture is just ahead, commander.
content.prevOriginal: The facility our friends want us to capture is just ahead, commander.
content.content: Объект, который нужен клиенту, прямо перед нами, командир.

content.original: From here, we should be able to get eyes on the base and a look at its defenses.
content.prevOriginal: From here, we should be able to get eyes on the base and a look at its defenses.
content.content: Отсюда мы сможем разведать территорию базы и ее оборону.

content.original: Clear out any defenders, and let's secure the place and get paid.
content.prevOriginal: Clear out any defenders, and let's secure the place and get paid.
content.content: Начинайте зачистку. Быстрее разберёмся с ними - быстрее получим деньги.

content.original: The base is ours, Commander. I'll notify our friends that they can move in and pick up the cargo.
content.prevOriginal: The base is ours, Commander. I'll notify our friends that they can move in and pick up the cargo.
content.content: База наша, командир. Сообщу заказчикам, чтобы заскочили за своим грузом.

content.original: Looks like our friends will have to find someone else to steal the cargo for them.
content.prevOriginal: Looks like our friends will have to find someone else to steal the cargo for them.
content.content: Похоже, нашим клиентам придется найти кого-нибудь другого, кто украдет для них груз.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые сигналы на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Командир, в вашем районе замечены вражеские силы. Придётся сначала разобраться с ними.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На радаре чисто, переходите к следующей цели.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.content: Десантный корабль прибывает на посадку! Пакуемся и сматываем!

content.original: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.content: Командующий, небольшое предупреждение: есть сообщения, что на базе могут быть укреплённые огневые точки.

content.original: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.prevOriginal: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.content: Турели, босс. А ведь только решил расслабиться. Вобщем, не спускайте с них глаз.

content.original: There's the facility. Looks like it's got a single lance defending it.
content.prevOriginal: There's the facility. Looks like it's got a single lance defending it.
content.content: Объект в зоне видимости. Похоже, он защищён всего одним копьём.

content.original: We're seeing some additional units in the region, so watch for possible reinforcements.
content.prevOriginal: We're seeing some additional units in the region, so watch for possible reinforcements.
content.content: В регионе замечены новые единицы техники, возможно прибытие подкреплений врага.

content.original: I don't like the unspecified 'some cargo', Commander, but whatever it is, it's probably just as bad if left in {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} hands.
content.prevOriginal: I don't like the unspecified 'some cargo', Commander, but whatever it is, it's probably just as bad if left in {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} hands.
content.content: Ох не люблю я, когда в целях миссии числится «какой-то груз», командир. Но, чем бы он ни был, - пусть лучше он будет у нас, чем в руках {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}.

content.original: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.content: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

content.original: Scout the Base
content.prevOriginal: Scout the Base
content.content: Проведите разведку территории базы

content.original: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.
content.content: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

content.original: Destroy the Enemy Force
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Enemy Force
content.content: Уничтожте вражеские силы

content.original: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.
content.content: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

content.original: Capture the Base with Friendly 'Mechs
content.prevOriginal: Capture the Base with Friendly 'Mechs
content.content: Займите дружественными мехами

content.original: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.
content.prevOriginal: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.
content.content: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

content.original: Hold Out as Enemies Counter Attack
content.prevOriginal: Hold Out as Enemies Counter Attack
content.content: Отразите вражескую контратаку

content.original: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.prevOriginal: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.content: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

content.original: Pacify the Area around the Base
content.prevOriginal: Pacify the Area around the Base
content.content: Обезопасьте территорию вокруг базы

content.original: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
content.prevOriginal: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
content.content: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

content.original: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements
content.content: Уничтожьте вражеские подкрепления

content.original: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.prevOriginal: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.content: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

content.original: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.content: Уничтожьте турели на базе

content.original: I'm having a great day, Commander. You know why? I just got the latest logistics data from our friends down on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Turns out that the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base where they keep all the stuff they're planning to ship off planet? It's going to be full of some extremely valuable cargo. Things we'd like to get our hands on. You capture the base, we'll loot it, and we'll both get paid.
content.prevOriginal: I'm having a great day, Commander. You know why? I just got the latest logistics data from our friends down on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Turns out that the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base where they keep all the stuff they're planning to ship off planet? It's going to be full of some extremely valuable cargo. Things we'd like to get our hands on. You capture the base, we'll loot it, and we'll both get paid.
content.content: Чудный денёк, командор. А знаете почему? Я только что получил свежие данные о перевозках от наших друзей на {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Оказывается все ценные грузы {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}, что планируется отправить с планеты, хранятся на одной конкретной базе. Ну разве не чудо? Там будет очень ценный груз. И мы хотим всё это «одолжить». Вы берёте базу, мы ее грабим, все будут в плюсе.

content.original: Surveillance Outpost
content.prevOriginal: Surveillance Outpost
content.content: Наблюдательный пост

content.original: These are the coordinates we received from {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence.
content.prevOriginal: These are the coordinates we received from {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence.
content.content: Вот координаты, которые мы получили от разведки {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}.

content.original: Move into position to survey the outpost, and let's figure out what we're dealing with here.
content.prevOriginal: Move into position to survey the outpost, and let's figure out what we're dealing with here.
content.content: Выдвигайтесь на позицию, чтобы обследовать заставу и давайте выясним, с чем мы имеем дело.

content.original: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: Удачи, командир. Оливейра, конец связи.

content.original: The outpost is ours, Commander. Our employer has agents inbound to take possession of the data archives.
content.prevOriginal: The outpost is ours, Commander. Our employer has agents inbound to take possession of the data archives.
content.content: Застава наша, командир. Клиент уже отправил своих агентов, чтобы завладеть архивами данных.

content.original: I think we're done here, Commander. What a mess.
content.prevOriginal: I think we're done here, Commander. What a mess.
content.content: Похоже мы здесь уже всё натворили, командир. Что за бардак...

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Красные точки на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Командир, в вашем районе замечены вражеские силы. Придётся сначала разобраться с ними.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На радаре чисто, переходите к следующей цели.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.content: Десантный корабль прибывает на посадку! Быстрее грузимся и сваливаем отсюда!

content.original: Commander, bad news. We're seeing energy signatures for fixed defenses powering up.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, bad news. We're seeing energy signatures for fixed defenses powering up.
content.content: Командир, у меня для вас плохие новости. Замечен всплеск энергетических сигнатур защитных систем.

content.original: Turrets. Remember they can spot you from a very long way off, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Turrets. Remember they can spot you from a very long way off, Commander.
content.content: Турели, коммандир. Не забывайте, что они могут дотянуться до вас на очень большом расстоянии.

content.original: Sure enough, that facility isn't abandoned at all. We need to sweep it for hostiles and clear them out.
content.prevOriginal: Sure enough, that facility isn't abandoned at all. We need to sweep it for hostiles and clear them out.
content.content: И разумеется это сооружение не заброшено. Нужно выкурить всех оттуда и уничтожить.

content.original: Remember there may be more enemy units in the field, so stay alert.
content.prevOriginal: Remember there may be more enemy units in the field, so stay alert.
content.content: Скорее всего врагов больше чем кажется, поэтому будьте начеку.

content.original: How relevant can intel from the ass end of nowhere really be? We're still being paid, so I suppose it doesn't matter, honestly.
content.prevOriginal: How relevant can intel from the ass end of nowhere really be? We're still being paid, so I suppose it doesn't matter, honestly.
content.content: Насколько надёжной может быть информация от неизвестного источника? Тем не менее, нам готовы заплатить, так что, честно говоря, остальное не имеет значения.

content.original: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.content: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

content.prevOriginal: Occupy the Outpost
content.content: Захватите заставу

content.prevOriginal: Pacify the Area Around the Outpost

content.prevOriginal: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
content.content: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

content.original: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.content: Уничтожьте подкрепления {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.prevOriginal: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.content: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

content.original: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.content: Уничтожьте турели на базе

content.original: Unremarkable, empty systems like this one are the perfect location for covert intelligence gathering operations. We believe there's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} doing exactly that. Monitoring the pattern of DropShips making landings on the planet has led {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts to a remote, apparently empty facility. Until just a few days ago, when we picked up the unmasked signature of a 'Mech's fusion engine powering up. That facility isn't empty, and we want the data stored there.
content.prevOriginal: Unremarkable, empty systems like this one are the perfect location for covert intelligence gathering operations. We believe there's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} doing exactly that. Monitoring the pattern of DropShips making landings on the planet has led {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts to a remote, apparently empty facility. Until just a few days ago, when we picked up the unmasked signature of a 'Mech's fusion engine powering up. That facility isn't empty, and we want the data stored there.
content.content: Ничем не примечательные пустые системы, подобные этой, - идеальное место для тайных операций по сбору разведданных. Мы полагаем, что здесь, на {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, есть оборудование {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}, предназначенное именно для этого. Мониторинг передвижений грузовых кораблей привёл аналитиков {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} к отдалённому объекту, который все считали заброшенным. Ровно до тех пор, пока всего несколько дней назад мы не обнаружили явную сигнатуру включения термоядерного двигателя меха. Этот объект не заброшен и мы хотим получить данные, которые там хранятся.
